select
from sys_organization where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND available=1

mapper.select: SELECT * from sys_organization WHERE available=1 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM sys_organization where available=1
select * from sys_organization where id in(select org_id from sys_user_org where username=#{userName}) AND available=1

mapper.update: UPDATE sys_organization SET available=-1 WHERE id=#{id}
